drones.name: DJI Mavic Air 2
drones.description: Mavic Air 2 offers DJI's most advanced panorama mode, with a higher dynamic range and colors that are vivid and incredibly accurate. It also features a Sony IMX586 image sensor and supports Quad Bayer technology, granting higher dynamic range and color sensitivity.

drones.name: DJI Mavic 2 Pro
drones.description: The Mavic 2 Pro from DJI is a drone that balances power, portability, and professional-quality visuals with the inclusion of a 20MP Hasselblad L1D-20c gimbal camera. ... There's also omnidirectional obstacle sensing that provides object avoidance with sensors on all sides of the Mavic 2 Pro.
